action.title: I'm Not That Kind of Talent
action.des: I am a sickly person who vomits blood whenever I get stressed. Deon Hart. In the demon realm, he became the commander of the 0th Corps, the most trusted by the demon king!

action.title: Lout of Count's Family
action.des: Kim Roksu wakes up as Cale Henituse - one of the villains in 'Birth of Hero'. Can Kim Roksu change the course of this story so he can enjoy a long and lavish life?

action.title: The Novel's Extra
action.des: Kim Hajin finds himself in a familiar world but an unfamiliar body. He had become a filler character with no importance to the story. The only clue to escaping is to stay close to the main storyline.

action.title: Life of a Magic Academy Mage
action.des: The notorious magic school 'Euroguard', self-sufficiency is default, monster appearance is an option, and professors are all the same! The salty school life that I have never seen before begins.

action.title: The Frozen Player Returns
action.des: The top five players in the world, including Specter Seo Jun-ho, finally defeated the Frost Queen, but they fell into a deep slumber. After 25 years passed specter awakes from his slumber.
